sentence: The announcement has caused a firestorm, with far-right, high-profile backers ranging from North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn to conservative activist Candace Owens taking to social media to voice their support for Robby Starbuck, a rival candidate who's been a mainstay of the pro-Trump movement.
title: Trump faces MAGA revolt over endorsement

sentence: @robbystarbuck is the correct pick for Tennessee's 5th district and Tennesseans have his back.? I endorsed @robbystarbuck months ago and I stand by my endorsement,? Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) tweeted.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Trump under fire over Tennessee primary nod

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn and Sen. Rand Paul endorsed Starbuck before Trump and pressed back on Trump's endorsement.

sentence: Brnovich is widely considered the strongest Republican candidate, but Masters boasts endorsements from Freedom Caucus-aligned Republicans such as Madison Cawthorn and Tucker Carlson.
title: Seats in Pennsylvania and Wisconsin

Madison Cawthorn's failed district swap, pro-Putin declarations, and evidence-free "orgy" allegations have motivated several prominent North Carolina Republicans to try to beat him in next month's primary, the party's biggest name is still very much in his corner.
title: Morning Digest: Why Trump pick needs to defend her 'bona fides' to get back on primary ballot

sentence: Meanwhile, voters have filed complaints with state elections officials to disqualify Georgia Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene and North Carolina Representative Madison Cawthornboth high-profile Trump alliesfrom seeking reelection for statements they made that have been construed as supportive of the January 6 capitol riot.

title: Trump's Power Dealt a Blow After Tennessee GOP Turns on Him

sentence: Prominent Trump allies like Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., and Candace Owens revolted over the endorsement, criticizing Trump for not backing MAGA favorite Robby Starbuck, a former music video producer and conservative influencer.
